name: Soviet Tetragon
description:
A Tetris game with the goal of getting everything right- proper rotation, good music, eventually local multiplayer battles.  And also cute characters just like in Puyo Puyo!

Known Issues that will be fixed in future updates:
-This will only display properly on a 16:9 display.
-The scoring or level system is not programmed yet.
-The hard drop function is finicky and doesn't always work after the first press.
-The game does nothing when you reach the top.

Credits:
Artwork by DreamCube Games
Programming tutorial used was from Valem on YouTube
Menu music from Trabant 33
In game music and sound effects from Nintendo
Original Tetris by Alexey Pajitnov
